00053 class Topology 
00054 {
00055 public:
00056 
00057     Topology();
00058    ~Topology();
00059 
00060 
00061     // Population: Molecules, segments, fragments, atoms
00062 
00063     Molecule    *AddMolecule (string molecule_name);
00064     Segment     *AddSegment  (string segment_name);
00065     Atom        *AddAtom     (string atom_name);
00066     Fragment    *AddFragment (string fragment_name);
00067     PolarSite   *AddPolarSite(string siteName);
00068     SegmentType *AddSegmentType (string typeName);
00069 
00070     Molecule    *getMolecule(int id) { return _molecules[id-1]; }
00071     Segment     *getSegment(int id)  { return _segments[id-1]; }
00072     Fragment    *getFragment(int id) { return _fragments[id-1]; }
00073     Atom        *getAtom(int id)     { return _atoms[id-1]; }
00074     PolarSite   *getPolarSite(int id) { return _polarSites[id-1]; }
00075     SegmentType *getSegmentType(int id) { return _segmentTypes[id-1]; }
00076 
00077     vector< Atom* >         &Atoms() { return _atoms; }
00078     vector< Fragment* >     &Fragments() { return _fragments; }
00079     vector< Segment* >      &Segments() { return _segments; }
00080     vector< Molecule* >     &Molecules() { return _molecules; }
00081     vector< PolarSite* >    &PolarSites() { return _polarSites; }
00082     vector< SegmentType* >  &SegmentTypes() { return _segmentTypes; }
00083 
00084     bool        Rigidify();
00085     void        setCanRigidify(bool yesno) { _canRigidify = yesno; }
00086     const bool  canRigidify() { return _canRigidify; }
00087     const bool  isRigid() { return _isRigid; }
00088     void        setIsEStatified(bool yesno) { _isEStatified = yesno; }
00089     const bool  isEStatified() { return _isEStatified; }
00090 
00091 
00092 
00093     // Periodic boundary: Can be 'open', 'orthorhombic', 'triclinic'
00094 
00095     vec              PbShortestConnect(const vec &r1, const vec &r2) const;
00096     const matrix    &getBox() { return _bc->getBox(); }
00097     double           BoxVolume() { _bc->BoxVolume(); }
00098     void             setBox(const matrix &box,
00099                             CSG::BoundaryCondition::eBoxtype boxtype =
00100                             CSG::BoundaryCondition::typeAuto);
00101 
00102     QMNBList       &NBList() { return _nblist; }
00103 
00104     // Trajectory meta data: step number, time, frame (= Db ID)
00105 
00106     const int        getStep() { return _step; }
00107     void             setStep(int step) { _step = step; }
00108     const double     getTime() { return _time; }
00109     void             setTime(double time) { _time = time; }
00110 
00111     int              getDatabaseId() { return _db_id; };
00112     void             setDatabaseId(int id) { _db_id = id; }
00113     void             CleanUp();
00114 
00115     void             PrintInfo(ostream &out);
00116     void             PrintInfo(FILE *out);
00117     void             WritePDB(FILE *out, string tag = "segments");
00118 
00119    
00120 protected:
00121 
00122     vector < Molecule* >    _molecules;
00123     vector < Segment* >     _segments;
00124     vector < Fragment* >    _fragments;
00125     vector < Atom* >        _atoms;
00126     vector < PolarSite* >   _polarSites;
00127     vector < SegmentType* > _segmentTypes;
00128 
00129     QMNBList               _nblist;
00130 
00131     CSG::BoundaryCondition *_bc;
00132     bool                    _hasPb;
00133 
00134     bool                    _canRigidify;
00135     bool                    _isRigid;
00136     bool                    _isEStatified;
00137 
00138     double _time;
00139     int    _step;
